select u.id, a.truename, wt.picurl, wt.name, wt.material, wt.high, wt.wide, wt.price, wt.createtime from t_user u LEFT OUTER JOIN t_artist a on u.id = a.uid LEFT OUTER JOIN t_work w on w.uid = u.id LEFT OUTER JOIN t_workitem wt on wt.wid = w.id where u.flag = 0 ORDER BY wt.createtime DESC LIMIT #{index},#{count}
